author: Allysia Finley
title: A Plan to Lure Moviegoers off the Couch
text:
If you’ve been to the movies lately—stop right there. If you’re like most Americans, you haven’t been to the movies lately. Theater attendance hit a 25-year low last year, and box-office revenue sank even as ticket prices rose.
Instead, you probably stream movies on your TV at home, and perhaps on your tablet or smartphone. Netflix, Amazon, HBO Go and other streaming services offer many movies within a couple of months of their theatrical release, not to mention a plethora of original content. Netflix’s original movie “Bright,”...
